original_text: From the room of Gemariah son of Shaphan the secretary, which was in the upper courtyard at the entrance of the New Gate of the temple, Baruch read to all the people at the Lord’s temple the words of Jeremiah from the scroll.
korean_text: 바룩이 여호와의 성전 위뜰 곧 여호와의 성전에 있는 새 문 어귀 곁에 있는 사반의 아들 서기관 그마랴의 방에서 그 책에 기록된 예레미야의 말을 모든 백성에게 낭독하니라

sentences.original_text: From the room of Gemariah son of Shaphan the secretary
which was in the upper courtyard
at the entrance of the New Gate of the temple
